projects.title: Company Dashboard
description: Developed a highly interactive React-based dashboard for administrators, enabling seamless CRUD operations on user data.
Implemented React Redux and Redux Saga for complex state management.
Optimized the dashboard for scalability and ease of use in an administrative setting.
Note: Due to company policy, this project cannot be publicly showcased.

projects.title: Team Yaaper Webchat Application
description: Developed a real-time chat application using Angular with CRUD functionalities, image upload, and administrator controls.
Used MongoDB for database management, Express.js for back-end routing, and Node.js for server-side logic.

projects.title: Peer Review University Website
description: Developed a peer review platform for university courses with user registration and CRUD functionality.
Utilized SQLite3 with Laravel for database management, routing, and authentication.
Implemented automated course creation from JSON files.

projects.title: Game Review Website
description: Built a game review website with CRUD functionality for game reviews.
Used SQLite3 for data management and Laravel for routing and authentication.

projects.title: Fake Store Mobile Application
description: Developed a mobile store application with CRUD functionalities for products.
Built using React Native and Expo Go for cross-platform performance on iOS and Android.

projects.title: Websmash Web Application
description: Developed a React-based web aggregator that integrates YouTube, Spotify, Pexels, and Flickr APIs to provide multimedia content.

projects.title: Docker / Kubernetes AWS Deployment
description: Deployed a web application on AWS EC2 using Docker, Docker-Compose, and Kubernetes for scalable server management.
Integrated MongoDB with a graphical interface and set up an Nginx reverse proxy.

education.degree: Bachelor of Information, Communications and Technology

education.institution: Chinese General Hospital College of Nursing

certifications.name: Griffith Plus
certifications.description: ICT PLUS is an employability-based program designed to create strong connections between university work, life experiences and future career. Earners understand the need to engage in ongoing career-development learning. Earners have completed achievable targets in the broad student-lifecycle stages. Tasks and activities for each stage are offered in curricular or extra-curricular formats. Earners of the ICT PLUS badge have some activities embedded in the degree program.

about.name: Jonas
about.title: Software Development Graduate
about.intro: I am a recent graduate in Software Development from Griffith University, combining my unique background as a registered nurse with over a decade of experience in the operating theatre. My passion for technology and my desire to create effective solutions inspired me to transition into a career in software development. As a versatile developer, I have experience in web development (both front-end and back-end), mobile development, and software applications, and I have also explored game development. I am committed to delivering high-quality results and thrive on challenges. I am eager to find new opportunities where I can leverage my diverse skills, contribute to innovative projects, and grow alongside my team.
about.objective: My goal is to become an expert in software engineering so I can use my skills in many different areas. I believe in a structured approach to learning, focusing on one topic at a time until I master it before moving on to the next. This step-by-step method keeps me motivated to learn and helps me build a wide range of skills for solving various problems.

awards.name: Griffith Academic Excellence 2024
awards.description: Earners of the Griffith Award for Academic Excellence badge have demonstrated high levels of academic achievement. Earners are non-award, undergraduate and postgraduate students who maintain a high level of academic achievement based on the successful completion of 40CP within the academic year. This badge represents an achievement credential type that is not for credit.
